Alexander Savosko

  • web-designer / 
  • frontend-developer

I believe that the main thing in creating an interactive UX / UI design for sites and applications is complete mutual understanding between the customer and the specialist.

However, this will not work without the ability to masterfully own graphic editors, as well as knowledge of the basics of composition, color theory, typography, psychology of perception and combination of shades.

I prefer to write code for websites and applications myself. I have the skills to work with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue, BEM, Gulp, WebPack, Git.

Sometimes the best solution is to use a CMS. I have a lot of experience working with OpenCart, WordPress, Joomla, Bitrix and Tilda.
